bibl.title: Determinatives in Greek Loan-Words and Proper-Names.
bibl.note: The determinatives used with the names of kings and emperors in the Graeco-Roman period carry no political meaning, but depend on scribal habits, which differ from one temple to another. - An updated list of Greek loan-words in Demotic.

bibl.title: Aspects of Demotic Lexicography. Acts of an International Colloquium held in Trier, 8 November 2010

bibl.seg: Willy Clarysse, Determinatives in Greek Loan-Words and Proper-Names.
S.P. Vleeming (ed.), Aspects of Demotic Lexicography. Acts of an International Colloquium held in Trier, 8 November 2010 = Studia Demotica. 11 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2013) pp. 1-24, 1 tabl.

The determinatives used with the names of kings and emperors in the Graeco-Roman period carry no political meaning, but depend on scribal habits, which differ from one temple to another. - An updated list of Greek loan-words in Demotic.
